185878142.review:
This review targets people that would normally scroll passed games like this: 

To be honest I hear "action RPG" and then I am like "hell yeah!" but then I see it's Western and go ): This is a great WARPG Diablo game for people that don't typically play these types of games but enjoy horde spectacle gameplay. You have lots of monsters on the screen with satisfying contact and well made particle effects. If like action JRPGs but have never played Diablo or Torchlight, then you'll like this.

You NEED the DLC for the full fledged experience.

185874796.review:
Проходил я игру на среднем уровне сложности. Первая треть игры еще ничего, игра эдакий веселенький клон диабло, но в необычном сеттинге. Хотя уже тут начинает настораживать довольно большие кучки мобов. Врагов всегда пачка, но бить их доставляет.
Во второй трети ты уже начинаешь понимать что нужно качать в первую очередь и докачиваешь все нужные скиллы, мобов уничтожаешь пачками, но иногда спотыкаешься на странно сбалансированных мобов. Попадаются очень жирные враги, которые выкачивают всю ману (а все дамажные скиллы зависят от нее), и при этом наносят фуру урона. Мне, к примеру приходилось возвращаться в хаб и перекачиваться обратно на самую слабую милишную атаку, так как только она не зависит от маны, но и дамага у нее раз в 5 меньше, чем у меня было до этого.
Наконец, в последней трети вылазит вся кривость геймдизайна и местного баланса. В финале каждая лока примерно на уровень опережает твой текущий. При этом защита от урона на шмотках и уровень дамага оружия начинает расти по экспоненте. Между мечом условно 25 и 26 уровня процентов 30-40 разница, тоже самое с защитой. В игре 3 основных вида урона от врагов  - физический, яд и молния. Если от физики еще можно как-то прокачаться, то от вторых я не нашел способа буста защиты, только от шмоток. Пока не прокачаешь эту разницу между твоим левелом и уровнем локи - крайне тяжело играть, противников куча и тебя сносят за секунды. Причем я проходил практически все сайды, это не помогает.
Ну и последние локации - это просто песня. Я там в тупую убегал от мобов до выхода, с ними не реально честно драться. Благо финальный босс, оказался гораздо легче чем усиленные противники. 
За последнюю треть и финал - жирный минус всей игре. В целом по скидке и если прям тянет на диаблоиды наверное можно поиграть, так как представителей жанра не особо то и много. Моя оценка 6 из 10.

185760630.review:
Fun game! Played it right after finishing Grim Dawn. Another great ARPG. GD allows you to rotate camera and place Rift Gates that take you to your base AND allow you to return to the origin of the Gate. VH only allows a 1-Way passage back to your base. bummer eh.
Other than that they are both worthy of our hard earned Gaming$$$.

185300173.review: great atmosphere, love the dark fantasy theme and the voice acting, but the I hope the fella that came with the idea of grappling enemies and those guys that run away has wet toast for years to come.

185284619.review: The Incredible Adventures берет  — подачей и оформлением. Охотник за нечистью очень приятно и литературно выражается, идеально сохраняя образ; его подруга каждые 15 минут выдает остроты; окружающие персонажи продуманы и прописаны настолько, чтобы каждая из отведенных им фраз звучала свежо и интересно. В этом смысле игру хочется сравнить, наверное, с Magicka — все не настолько абсурдно, но настолько же талантливо.

185228702.review: One of these days I'd like to finish this one, but what I did play was a fun looter ARPG. The environments are great and the gameplay is pretty fun. It's what you'd imagine from one of these games.

185216589.review: A Classic Hack and Slash with good Story

185184954.review:
This is a neutral review. 

This game is not a bad game, it's an average Hack and Slash RPG. When you analyze it superficially, it has decent graphics, soundtrack, gameplay and story. It's polished. It's entertaining, but only until midgame when it becomes a chore. 

But, there were things I didn't like. 
1) If you didn't buy the DLCs, you can pick only 1 class! the bounty hunter. I'm a gamer since the 80's and never in my life have I seen a RPG that limits you to 1 class in the vanilla version. This is, in my opinion, unacceptable. 

2) The story could be better. 
- In the game you are not the famous Abraham Van Helsing, but his son. Abraham got a call to help the region of Borgovia, but for some reason he wasn't avaiable, so he sends his son, who is the main character. 
- You have only 1 companion in the game and it's the ghost of a woman. That ghost fights with you but it doesn't make any sense that a ghost fights against material creatures. Also she is practically useless in battle. The story is about the war between Borgovia's aristocracy and technocracy. The story forces you to take the side of the aristocracy ( and to even be ally with a vampire?! ). It would have been better if you could take the side of some people's liberation movement against both the aristocracy and the technocracy. 

3) It has long loading times. 

4) The skill system is well made but like in all similar games, you have limited skill points and you can fully level up only a limited amount of skills ( you will end up having just a few active and a few passive skills ). Like in all Hack and Slash RPGs, you have to be very careful what to level up, some builds will be efficient, some will not. You have to research beforerhand if you want to beat the game. 

5) The game consists of a gazillion of battles against large packs of strong enemies. All enemies are grouped in large packs, and when you trigger 1 enemy in 1 pack, all the other members of the pack will charge at you like the blood lusted orcs from Warcraft 2. So combat for me (Bounty Hunter being the only class) de facto consisted of kiting enemies, which means firing and retreating, firing and retreating until you can thin the horde and finish the few remaining enemies. 28 hours of doing just that! Also it was frustrating to die always at the same manner: when a large pack of monsters surrounded me, I was blocked, and the health quickly fell down to 0 due to being overwhelmed. It was always the same thing. Luckily, the penalty for death is only a percentage of money you have, and it can be 0 if you agree to respawn in the town base.  
For ranged characters the game does not give you a precise way of targeting, so it's hard to target the enemy you want, and it's even hard to point to the way you want to move when there are many monsters around you because the game would target a monster instead of targeting the ground to move out. 

6) You can't manually save. The game saves automatically. So basically it's just 1 save file. That means you can fail quests, withouth the possibility of loading and retrying. Luckily, I failed only 1 side quest. I also didn't like that sometimes you find some some mysterious items/suspstanses you can eat. Some times they permanently give you bonuses to attributes, and some times they take away something permanently. There is no way of knowing what the consequences will be. For example, I ate something and it took away 50% of poison resistance permanently. And you can't load. 

7) The game has 3 chapters. At the beginning it was quite interesting and fun, with interesting quests and side quests. To me it's clear they invested most of their creative energy to produce Chapter 1. Chapter 2 and 3 are not as interesting, they are rather dull story wise and quest wise. At a point in Chapter 3 I was really bored and couldn't wait to finish the game. It's like they either run out of ideas mid way or started rushing the game. The ending is a cliffhanger, because they want you to buy Van Helsing 2 and 3. 

8) There is a tower defence mini game there is very poorly implemented. The only thing you can do after beating the game - scenarios - consist of doing the same maps against the same monsters - only super charged with extra health and damage. That was poorly implemented as well. 

I played at hard difficulty, so somebody could ask me why I didn't play at normal if I found the combat tedious. Well, I'm an experienced RPG player so I often like to play such games at hard difficulty for the extra challenge. I read in the forums that even at normal the game is quite challenging, so there is no big difference. I was able to beat the game at hard, it's just that it was very tedious. 

Again, it's not a bad game, it's ok. Players who like this genre might enjoy it. One thing is sure thou, there are much better Hack and Slash RPGs out there.

185148513.review: Играть на геймпаде практически не возможно из-за того, что в рюкзаке нереально выбрать раздел с броней и лечебными зельями. Колесо выбора разделов в этих местах просто проскакивает. Для переключения между геймпадом или клавой с мышкой приходится перезапускать игру.

184772601.review: Unironically the most frustrating game i have ever played. The setting is great, voice acting is great and overall monster design is amazing, however the balance is completely fucked. You constantly get bombarded by 50 billion enemies with 50 billion health each, so you just hit them 50 billion times for 50 billion minutes until eventually they maybe die. Death is meaningless, you just respawn so the game really isnt difficult, ist just incredibly frustrating to stand there, swarmed by 50-60 enemies, you cant accurately aim at individual enemies because they cover your screen like a swarm of flies, you cant move, you can just trade blows for 50 minutes of kite for 50 minutes while doing minimal damage. Seriously, why do they have so much health, some mini-bosses are completely ridiculous and its just not fun, its tedious, frustrating and unrewarding. Also you CANNOT CHANGE THE DIFFICULTY OF A PLAYTHROUGH. I started on normal, balance was good at first but now its a slogfest of 50 billion hp per enemy and i really wish i could tone it down, not about to start a new palythrough, absolutely pathetic balancing.

184669441.review: I really like this game. my biggest issue is combat..It never actually feels like am actually hitting anything. Almost like swiping at air and then things die but with no real impact

184540012.review: za ty prachy, co jsem to koupil (1,49 euro), je to parádní diablovka , jsou další dva díly

184472605.review: descent diablo clone with a nice story

184451486.review: Ogólnie gra jest ok. Ładna grafika pomimo tylu lat na karku. Fabuła taka średnia, od początku nie wiadomo o co chodzi, potem to już jest mało istotne. Walenie mobów bardzo przyjemne, trzeba się trochę namęczyć. Level cap na podstawie 30 lvl, trochę mało, drzewko umiejętności nie daje dużo możliwości do rozwoju. Grając Thaumaturge mam wrażenie, że postać jest mocno OP. Build pod ścianę ognia ułatwia dosyć mocno rozgrywkę. Grając w End Game tą postacią nie miałem żadnego wyzwania. I właśnie End Game jest nudny, nie ma za bardzo nic do zaoferowania. Ogólnie fajna gierka jako odskocznia na dwa wieczory.

184424756.review: Приключения Ван Хельсинга и Прекрасной Катерины

184397868.review: The play style is like a better version of Diablo 3 & 4 part 1 of 3 and the game art is kinda gothic horror steam punk. The mythos follow more European legends and lore than mesopotamian mythos and lore. Expect more things along the lines of vampires and other similar monsters. Characters from the first transfer to the second game and parts of your progress from number two will transfer to number three.

184314615.review:
The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing - це захопливий представник жанру, який виділяється своїм гумором, атмосферою та інтерактивною історією. Хоча гра не позбавлена недоліків, її шарм і різноманітність ігрового процесу роблять її достойною уваги! Вона ідеально підходить для тих, хто шукає щось більш легке і самобутнє у світі екшн-RPG. Сюжет проходиться приблизно 15 годин.
Художній стиль гри вирізняється деталізованими локаціями, що створюють похмуру і водночас чарівну атмосферу.
Музичний супровід доповнює атмосферу, підкреслюючи напругу під час битв і додаючи містичності в спокійні моменти.


П.С. РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!

183793087.review: Безумно красивая и интересная игра! Если любите такие игры как Дьябло, то это игра определенно для вас! Самое сочное, что можно проходить игру в кооперативе! На распродаже в стиме игра стоит сущие копейки, берите и ни за что не пожалеете, разрабам плотный респект! Вас ждет куча крутых локаций, атмосферной музыки, интересные квесты, умопомрачительные мобы и многогранный тонкий юмор!

183697807.review:
El juego es bueno pero no compensa mucho ya que muchas habilidades no se pueden usar simultáneamente ya que el menú de la misma son solamente 6 habilidades y solo 2 son potenciales  ( 2 de ellas es para usar el ayudante que nos dan de la historia y otro es como el ataque básico que te va acompañar hasta finalizar el juego literalmente )

Al estar mayormente en oferta si les recomiendo comprarlo para pasar el tiempo pero si lo comparamos con otros juegos del estilo y teniendo en cuenta que salio después que diablo 3 que es mas completo da mucho que desear.

183670188.review: Il gioco non è male, ma dopo qualche ora aveva iniziato ad annoiarmi

183640321.review: a Fun little game, it'a an isometric Arpg in the a world where the horror stories are alive in a classical horror theme where there are mad scientist, vampires, king of beggers and etc.... the gameplay it'a classical ARPG type of gameplay but with single target attacks instead of single AoE attack ( this can change if you choose some type of build like for example a shooter build ), the story is simple and the game it's short for an Isometric Arpg and this can be good or bad ( for me personally i hoped in a little more things to do in Borgovia ), the gameplay is fun and you basically two character to play, Van Hellsing and Katarina with their skill, passive and attribute. the Gamedesign sometimes is a little infuriating, you can get stuck in some hitbox or getting one shotted by some enemies with instant trasmission projecctile. Overall the game is good and a good start for the Isometric Arpg genere.
